ygData.subject: Murderous Merchant In Akanon.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello fellow Wizards, A wood elf friend of mine was recently KOS immediatly upon entering Akanon by a Merchant. He wasnt able to get the name of this npc
ygData.messageBody:
Hello fellow Wizards,
A wood elf friend of mine was recently KOS immediatly upon entering Akanon by a Merchant. He wasnt able to get the name of this npc though. Does anyone know the name of this npc so I can steer clear of him. I need to go to Akanon to get my lightning spell soon.
Another question. Has anyone had sucsess in getting a black robe from neriak by having friend get it and then giving consent to loot his corpse? This was discussed here a while ago and was wondering if it was indeed possible to do. If robes cannot be traded and/or sold (even ones from najena or the thatamurgist) this seems like a serious bug since these robes are valuable to us casters but not to others and they would likely want to sell them if they(non-casters) got those robes. Any thoughts?
